channel.title: Probably obvious
channel.description:
Now, before i ask, the answer might be a little easy, but sometimes i lack focus and give up too easily...
With that being said, does anyone know where the client draws the skull over the players head? I've look all throughout the mudclient class, but have found nothing.
Thanks in advance, imthenull

item.title: Probably obvious
item.dc:creator: @IlikeArrays IlikeArrays
item.description:
@IlikeArrays wrote:

[quote="-Nothing, post:6, topic:395942"][quote author=darscape link=topic=493126.msg3605440#msg3605440 date=1306068571]
Whatchya planning to do?
[/quote]
Probably changing the skull to a pokeball?[/quote]

Just send a bubble in that case, unless your in a battle…

Read full topic

item.title: Probably obvious
item.dc:creator: @imthenull imthenull
item.description:
@imthenull wrote:

[quote=“vortex, post:3, topic:395942”]inside method52

if (mob.anInt179 == 1 && mob.anInt163 == 0) { int k3 = j1 + i + k / 2; if (mob.currentSprite == 8) k3 -= (20 * k1) / 100; else if (mob.currentSprite == 9) k3 += (20 * k1) / 100; int j4 = (16 * k1) / 100; int l4 = (16 * k1) / 100; gameGraphics.spriteClip1(k3 - j4 / 2, j - l4 / 2 - (10 * k1) / 100, j4, l4, SPRITE_MEDIA_START + 13); }[/quote]
Thanks you

Read full topic
